channel.title: Soda Springs|Caribou County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Soda Springs|Caribou County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-30 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-30 east. Distance to Georgetown, Montpelier, and Kemmerer (Wyoming).

item.title: US-30 East/ID-34 North at US-30/ID-34 Split
item.description: US-30 East/ID-34 North at US-30/ID-34 split in Soda Springs. Turn left to continue north on ID-34. The ID-34 shield pictured here is the new style of Idaho state highway shield.

item.title: US-30 East/ID-34 North Approaching US-30/ID-34 Split
item.description: US-30 East/ID-34 North approaching US-30/ID-34 split in Soda Springs. Turn left for ID-34 north to Wayan and Jackson (Wyoming). Continue east on US-30 for Georgetown and Montpelier.

item.title: US-30 East/ID-34 North - Soda Springs
item.description: US-30 East/ID-34 North approaching US-30/ID-34 split in Soda Springs.

item.title: ID-34 South at US-30
item.description: ID-34 South at US-30. Turn left for US-30 west to Montpelier. Turn right for US-30 east to Pocatello and ID-34 south to Preston.

item.title: ID-34 South Approaching US-30
item.description: ID-34 South approaching US-30 in Soda Springs. ID-34 south joins US-30 east through Soda Springs.

item.title: ID-34 South - Soda Springs
item.description: ID-34 south (East Hooper Ave.) at S. 3rd St. Turn left to continue south on ID-34.

item.title: ID-34 South - Soda Springs
item.description: Entering Soda Springs on ID-34 south. Population 3058. Soda Springs is the county seat of Caribou County.

item.title: US-30 West at ID-34
item.description: US-30 west at ID-34 north to Wayan and Jackson. ID-34 joins US-30 west through Soda Springs towards McCammon and Pocatello.

item.title: US-30 West at ID-34
item.description: US-30 west at ID-34 in Soda Springs. Turn right on ID-34 north for Afton and Jackson (both in Wyoming). ID-34 joins US-30 west through Soda Springs. Continue west on US-30/ID-34 for McCammon and Pocatello. ID-34 is part of the Pioneer Historic Byway, which is why the shield is a brown color.

item.title: US-30 East - Oregon Trail Bear Lake Scenic Byway
item.description: US-30 East in Soda Springs - Oregon Trail - Bear Lake Scenic Byway.

item.title: ID-34 South - Soda Springs
item.description: ID-34 south (East Hooper Ave.) at North 3rd St. Turn left to continue south on ID-34.
